alert.note: Alert for Ford; Iroquois (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 09 at 6:01AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong winds and heavy rain will impact portions of Ford and Iroquois Counties through 630 AM CST... At 600 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a band of heavy showers producing strong winds extending from 7 miles north of Gibson City to Homer. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Gilman around 625 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Melvin, Thawville, Loda, Claytonville, Elliott, Crescent City, Sibley, Roberts, Clarence and Wellington. Including the following interstate... I-57 between mile markers 258 and 285. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
